title: string contain underscore
query: In courses dataset under_score, find entries whose Instructor begins with "z" and Instructor does not end with "a" and Title does not include 1 and Title does not include "&" and Department does not include "e" and ID does not include 1; show Department, ID, Instructor, Title, UUID, Average, Pass, Fail and Audit; sort in descending order by Instructor.
